body:
Now, I think my internet is very slow but I want to know what 
other peoples internet speed is so I am posting this discussion  

Instructions:
click the link http://www.ozspeedtest.com/ 
click the start button 
wait 10 seconds once page has loaded
Post your internet speed back to me 

Cheers, Hudmister14

This will only do ur download speed but if you can when ur finished ur download speed test 
there is a button that can test ur upload speed test aswell and I would like to know that also in the comments

replies.body: That was the ping to a server 20 miles away from where I live, now think with common sense, I live in Britain, and Avicus is located in Canada, my ping would be 6 or 7 times bigger, do the maths, 180ms or 210ms. So I'm not a pinger to Avicus! ^.^
replies.body_tagged: That was the ping to a server 20 miles away from where I live, now think with common sense, I live in Britain, and Avicus is located in Canada, my ping would be 6 or 7 times bigger, do the maths, 180ms or 210ms. So I'm not a pinger to Avicus! ^.^

replies.body:
Same thing I said to Whitt, think about that ping, 32ms, I'm located in Britain and the server that it pinged to was 20 miles away from where I live, now Avicus is hosted in Canada and I live in Britain. So think about it, I would have averagely around 150ms to 210ms, so I'm not a pinger lol
April (awesome_apricot) has 6ms to the same server, so my Internet is awful, so, yeah, my case is closed.
